txt.en: 'Look over to the edge of the woods. Do you see the Orcs cutting down the beautiful woods of Talath Anor?!\n\n'We must stop them. They have destroyed so much of this land, the farms, the orchard. We can not let them take the forests as well!'
'We did it! I'm so glad that we were able to save the trees from being turned into machines of war. I hope to take walks here with my children when I am older. That sounds nice.'
You and Tolwin notice that Orcs are starting to cut down Talath Anor's wooded lands. This destruction to beauty must be stopped.
Mordor loggers can be found on the edge of Talath Anor's woods.\n\nYou should defeat Mordor loggers.
